articles.title: I found the MagSafe accessory you didn't know you needed - especially for power users - ZDNet
articles.description: Lexar's SSD is small, fast, and attaches to your iPhone with a snap - all without adding much bulk or weight.

articles.title: Switch 2 GameCube Controller Rumours Resurface Following New Nintendo Filing - Nintendo Life
Samsung soundbar owners report major problems after latest firmware update - The Verge
articles.description: Owners of Samsung’s HW-Q990D Dolby Atmos soundbar are complaining about bricked hardware after what appears to be a faulty firmware update.

articles.title: Android 16 Beta 3: ‘Limit to 80%’ will fully charge your Pixel every 1-2 weeks - 9to5Google
articles.description: With Android 16 Beta 3, Google is now more specific about how “Limit to 80%” will fully charge your Pixel to 100% “every one to two weeks.”

articles.title: Hands-on with the 2025 iPad Air: Slightly better, slightly faster - Ars Technica
articles.description: Apple’s annual refresh is a minor one, but not much needed to change anyway.

articles.title: Hear what Horizon Zero Dawn actor Ashly Burch thinks about AI taking her job - The Verge
articles.description: Ashly Burch, the actor behind Horizon Zero Dawn’s Aloy, shared her thoughts about the Sony experiment that saw her character being voiced and performed by AI.
